headline: Wall Street Bulls Look Optimistic About PulteGroup (PHM): Should You Buy?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), PulteGroup (PHM) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Bear of the Day: PulteGroup, Inc. (PHM)
summary: Homebuilding powerhouse PulteGroup's (PHM) earnings outlook has faded significantly in 2025 amid a tough operating environment for PHM and many of its peers.
